‘yuda muktha kalapaya – shri lankawe ghathaka bhumiya’ warthamaya sinama pataye adhyakshaka kalam makre siya nishpadanayata adala mema warthawe kotasa padakakara ganimin liyu lipiyaka mese kiyayi: wasara gananawaka shri lanka aanduwe prathikshepa kirim walin pasu yuda aparadha saha nithiyata paribahirawa karana lada ghathanayan pilibanda wanal fo sakshi dan sadharana bawa piligena thibe.
edayin wasara desiyakata pamana pasuwa adhirajyayawadin irakaya aakramanaya kerune iraka janathawata prajathanthrawadaya uda karawannata bawa pawasamini.
